For those with iextreme prior to Lite 1.1 (1.4, 1.5, 1.6, 1.61) you need the activation disk, and then it will work ok. Insert activation disk, run, see message saying that it is not a xbox disk, remove it, inset Game disk, play.

People with firmware prior to Lite 1.1 (1.4,1.5, 1.6, 1.61) need to use the activation disk. Insert activation disk, play, see message saying that it is not a xbox disk, remove activation disk, insert game disk, play. The activation disk can be found in this forum.
